 EthSpi
 

The actual communication between the EFM32 chips and the ethernet controller is done via SPI using the driver from this file.


 I2c
 Ksz8851snl
 

The low level communication between EFM32 chips and the ethernet controller Micrel KSZ8851 SNL is realized by the functions from this file.
